Package org.example.service

Interface BirdService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BirdServiceImpl
public interface BirdService

  • Method Details

    • getBirds

      BirdResponseDto getBirds()
      Gets all the birds from the database.
      Returns:
      a dto that contains an array of Bird

    • getBirds

      BirdResponseDto getBirds(String name, String color)
      Gets birds according to criteria. If none of the criteria is provided, it retrieves all birds. If one of the criteria is provided, it uses only that criterion.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the bird, optional (nullable)
      color - color of the bird, optional (nullable)
      Returns:
      a dto that contains an array of Bird

    • createBird

      BirdResponseDto createBird(String name, String color, Double weight, Double height)
      Creates a new bird according to given characteristics.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the bird, mandatory
      color - color of the bird, mandatory
      weight - weight of the bird, optional (nullable)
      height - height of the bird, optional (nullable)
      Returns:
      a dto that contains an array of size one which has the newly created Bird.

    • updateBird

      BirdResponseDto updateBird(Long id, String name, String color, Double weight, Double height)
      Updates a bird by setting all the given attributes in the Bird object.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the existing bird, mandatory
      name - new name for the bird, mandatory
      color - new color for the bird, mandatory
      weight - new weight for the bird, optional (nullable)
      height - new height for the bird, optional (nullable)
      Returns:
      a dto that contains an array of size one which has the updated Bird.

    • deleteBird

      void deleteBird(Long id)
      Deletes a Bird by its id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the Bird in the database
